title: Torrent Power commits investment of Rs 64,000 crore in renewable energy projects
description: Torrent Power Limited has committed over Rs 64,000 crore to renewable energy projects at RE-Invest 2024 in Gandhinagar. The investment aims to generate employment for 26,000 people. The company plans to achieve 10 GW of installed renewable energy capacity by 2030 and set up a green ammonia production facility.
